docs.lead_paragraph: Baby boomers are turning to the growing number of firms that specialize in placing older workers in part-time or temporary positions in specific industries.

headline.main: Consulting as a Bridge Between Full-Time Work and Retirement
headline.print_headline: Consulting as a Bridge Between Full-Time Work and Retirement

docs.abstract: Retiring column; some baby boomers who are intent on phasing into retirement are exploring possibility of working as consultants in fields in which they have experience, which will offer them a bridge job before retiring; such positions offer workers flexibility in hours but allow them to continue getting income.
docs.snippet: Baby boomers are turning to the growing number of firms that specialize in placing older workers in part-time or temporary positions in specific industries.

docs.lead_paragraph: Students at all 10 campuses of the University of California will be required to be screened for tuberculosis and vaccinated for measles, mumps, rubella and other diseases under a new health plan set to take effect in 2017, the university said on Friday.

headline.main: Measles Outbreak Spurs New Action in California, New Mexico
headline.print_headline: Measles Outbreak Spurs New Action in California, New Mexico

docs.snippet: Students at all 10 campuses of the University of California will be required to be screened for tuberculosis and vaccinated for measles, mumps, rubella and other diseases under a new health plan set to take effect in 2017, the university said on...

docs.lead_paragraph: A season in the charmed, cutthroat life of the N.F.L.’s most enigmatic quarterback.
docs.abstract: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady's 2014-15 season in many ways serves as type of recapitulation of his NFL career, mirroring way his skills were first questioned and occasioned doomsaying only to result in string of successes leading up to Super Bowl.
docs.snippet: A season in the charmed, cutthroat life of the N.F.L.’s most enigmatic quarterback.
